type.name: org.gradle.testfixtures.ProjectBuilder
type.description:
*

Creates dummy instances of {@link org.gradle.api.Project} which you can use in testing custom task and plugin * implementations.

* *

To create a project instance:

* *
    * *
  1. Create a {@code ProjectBuilder} instance by calling {@link #builder()}.
    2. * *
  2. Optionally, configure the builder.
    3. * *
  3. Call {@link #build()} to create the {@code Project} instance.
    4. * *
* *

You can reuse a builder to create multiple {@code Project} instances.

method.name: builder
method.description: * Creates a project builder. * * @return The builder

method.name: withGradleUserHomeDir
method.description: * Specifies the Gradle user home for the builder. If not set, an empty directory under the project directory * will be used. * @return The builder

method.name: withName
method.description: * Specifies the name for the project * * @param name project name * @return The builder

method.name: withParent
method.description: * Specifies the parent project. Use it to create multi-module projects. * * @param parent parent project * @return The builder

method.name: withProjectDir
method.description: * Specifies the project directory for the project to build. * * @param dir The project directory * @return The builder
